about_the_game:
Fate Seeker: “The Hidden Tiger” is the latest DLC of “Fate Seeker”, the original single-player game released by JSL Game Corporation, including exciting expansion plots, hard battles, whole new scenes, whole new team mode.

The plot of “The Hidden Tiger” continue the previous story. Living in Stream Village, a mysterious letter was sent to you one day, it reveals astonishing messages. To find out the truth, you decide to enter the Gray Goose Valley, and therefore the world has changing…

Rumor has it that a secret scroll of Kong Fu was guided by a real master: Lord of Gray Goose Valley. Those who favored by this master were allowed to practice their Kong Fu in the valley and reached into a highest level. Many famous heroes enter the valley successively to get into the higher ground, but never come back. To unravel this mystery, you decide to enter this trouble spot, yet accidents and adventures came along. Can you solve these problems and reveal the truth?
detailed_description:
Fate Seeker: “The Hidden Tiger” is the latest DLC of “Fate Seeker”, the original single-player game released by JSL Game Corporation, including exciting expansion plots, hard battles, whole new scenes, whole new team mode.

The plot of “The Hidden Tiger” continue the previous story. Living in Stream Village, a mysterious letter was sent to you one day, it reveals astonishing messages. To find out the truth, you decide to enter the Gray Goose Valley, and therefore the world has changing…

Rumor has it that a secret scroll of Kong Fu was guided by a real master: Lord of Gray Goose Valley. Those who favored by this master were allowed to practice their Kong Fu in the valley and reached into a highest level. Many famous heroes enter the valley successively to get into the higher ground, but never come back. To unravel this mystery, you decide to enter this trouble spot, yet accidents and adventures came along. Can you solve these problems and reveal the truth?
developers: 甲山林娛樂股份有限公司
name: 天命奇御 Fate Seeker - 伏虎迷蹤

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 32bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.8HZ or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4690K or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible

publishers: 甲山林娛樂股份有限公司
short_description: Fate Seeker: “The Hidden Tiger” is the latest DLC of “Fate Seeker”, the original single-player game released by JSL Game Corporation, including exciting expansion plots, hard battles, whole new scenes, whole new team mode and complete DLC voices. A mysterious letter was sent to you one day, it reveals astonishing messages.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
